      • addCourse

        public void addCourse​(int courseID,
                      java.lang.String courseName,
                      int professorID,
                      int[] capacityLecture,
                      int[] capacityTutorial,
                      int[] capacityLab)
        Add Course into courseDB after instantiating Course
        Parameters:
        courseID - identification number of course
        courseName - name of course
        professorID - identification number of professor
        capacityLecture - maximum number of students this lecture can take
        capacityTutorial - maximum number of students this tutorial can take
        capacityLab - maximum number of students this lab can take

      • setVacancyByCourseSession

        public void setVacancyByCourseSession​(int courseID,
                                      SessionOption option,
                                      int ID)
        Set vacancy for a Session of a Course
        Parameters:
        courseID - identification number of course
        option - ENUM value of LECTURE, LAB, TUTORIAL. Represents the difference Session types.
        ID - identification number of the chosen lecture,lab or tutorial
